climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🌙【NO MORE PAIN WHILE SLEEPING】Do you suffer from insomnia all night? Do you wake up with neck cramps or back pain? Our ergonomically memory foam pillow perfectly supports your head, neck and shoulders. The contour pillow naturally fit your spine, providing proper support for spinal alignment, help to relieve pressure. Wake up refreshed without sore! Choose us, choose better sleep and better life!

🌙【2 HEIGHTS FOR ANY SLEEP STYLES】When you are still troubled about not finding the right height pillow, our bed pillows have 2 different heights(24*13.8*5.3/3.7inch L*H*W) on both sides for you to choose, that you can choose the more suitable height for your sleeping posture and enjoy a comfortable sleep. The adjustable orthopedic pillow for neck pain relief is suitable for side, back, stomach sleepers and low pillow sleepers.

🌙【SLOW REBOUND MEMORY FOAM PILLOW】Ylekto cervical pillow is made of high-density CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex certified slow rebound memory foam, which is non-toxic, odorless and keeps its shape and firmness for long term use. The orthopedic pillow is firm enough to provide support for your head, neck, shoulders and back muscles when you lie on your back or side, and soft enough to ensure maximum comfort and great relaxation for your body.

🌙【BREATHABLE AND REMOVABLE PILLOWCASE】Ylekto side sleeper pillow comes with a high quality double-layer pillowcase, which is soft and breathable. It has a zipper, removable and machine washable and skin-friendly. The ergonomic pillow cover is made of cold silk technology fabric that fits perfectly against the skin. The soft and cooling breathable fabric keeps you cool all night and gives you the comfortable sleep!

🌙【HASSLE FREE AFTER-SALE SERVICE】Pick out an excellent ergonomic pillow for pain relief, and you will find your sleeping improves unexpectedly. Not only enjoy waking up without a stiff neck, but also sleep better in the night. Ylekto cervical neck pillow is perfect for the elderly, office workers, students and all ages people, long-term use will greatly improve the quality of sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Believe the hype: it's worth the investment to avoid neck pain
reviews.reviewText: I had a fairly plump pillow before I bought this but I would still wake up with an occasional pain in my neck and shoulders. Bought this pillow and I no longer have pain in the mornings. I was even having issues sleeping on my side but this pillow is thick enough to make it extremely comfortable for your side sleeping nights. Soft pillow but firm enough that it is extremely comfortable and contours to you. The pillow has different features. One side has a contour to cradle your head while the other flipped side is more flatter. And one end of the pillow is higher than the other end so you get to choose which side is best for your neck. I personally enjoy the thicker end since it contours your neck very well. It's very comfortable and honestly I think it has helped with eliminating my snoring as well. Only downside of this pillow is the pillowcase. It comes with a pillowcase but it has a built in zipper that's very finicky and can get stuck so I just bought a separate pillowcase for easy washing. It tends to slip out of the case often because of the material of the pillow but I'll deal with it. Overall very satisfied and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars # 1 choice - Worth the money for us.
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely ecstatic with my new pillow! This is the first-rate purchase I've made in a long time, and it has transformed my sleep quality. Here's why I give it a solid five stars:1. Exceptional unprecedented Comfort: From the moment I rested my head on this pillow, I knew I was in for a treat. It cradles my head and neck exquisitely, providing just the right amount of support. I wake up feeling refreshed and free from any stiffness or discomfort.2. Superior Quality: The craftsmanship of this pillow is visible in every detail. The materials used are of highest quality, and it feels incredibly durable. I have no doubt this pillow will last me a long time.3. Temperature Control: I'm a hot sleeper, but this pillow somehow manages to keep me cool throughout the night. No more tossing and turning trying to find the cool side of the pillow!4. Easy Maintenance: Cleaning and maintaining this pillow is a breeze. I've had no trouble keeping it in pristine condition, and it still looks and feels like new.In summary, this pillow is a game-changer for anyone looking to upgrade their sleep experience. It's not just a pillow; it's a ticket to a good night's sleep, every night. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of the perfect pillow. It's well worth the investment, and I can't imagine sleeping without it. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Supportive, from a short person
reviews.reviewText: (Written from the perspective of my granddaughter-in-law) I am 5'1" (about 155 cm), primarily a back and side sleeper, who gets really warm at night and has been dealing with a lot of neck and shoulder pain, as well as breathing issues in my sleep causing snoring, interrupted sleep, and morning headaches. This pillow is not a substitute for medical intervention, but for the past few nights that I have used it, it has accomplished every task it set out to do quite well.I have only used the shorter side (I think the other side would be too high for my head and neck), but it is very comfortable to lay on, soft while firm and supportive enough to keep my head and neck positioned properly throughout the night. Because my head and neck are finally kept at an appropriate position while I sleep, my pain is noticeably reduced (not gone, but it has only been a few nights and I would also benefit from other habits), and my breathing and sleeping are better.While the place where your head is on the cover will warm, the rest of it stays cool and when you move, the cover cools back down quickly as well. The pillow itself also doesn't have any off or chemical smell, so there was no need to air it out before I could use it. The cover is easy to remove, replace, and wash (which you should always do first when you get a new pillow, to disinfect it).One comment I do have is I believe taller people might find the pillow to be lacking in height or support, but for my needs and experience, I am greatly enjoying this pillow and recommend it to you if anything in my review sounds appealing or relevant! I will update this should anything change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great night sleep
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best contour pillows I have ever slept on. The contoured memory foam provides a snug and firm support for my neck and head which enables me to sleep through the night without waking up due to the discomfort of misalignment of my neck vertibrae. The entire pillow was constructed of high quality materials and it keeps its shape day in and day out. I have never gone back to regular shape pillows once I tried contour pillows years ago, and I have purchased many. This is a very well constructed pillow of high quality. Definitely worth the price.
